name: Puzzle (Shrooxy0)
description:
Puzzle is a game where you control a block and direct it to the finish line.

You unlock levels by completing each of them.

As of now, there are only 9 levels. But don't worry you can create your own levels and share them with your friends! If you ever wonder where your custom levels are saved, head to "C:\Users\XXX\AppData\LocalLow\Shrooxy\Puzzle\Custom Levels".
